sentence: So glad we chose this resort to spend our vacation
My wife and I had a great time and will make this a yearly vacation
As a family with a wee one this hotel was the best part of our stay
The grounds are so beautiful and I had an amazing and relaxing trip
Girls trip every April for birthday and we love the island it is feels like we are locals since we have been coming for the last 12 years
We came here to enjoy a little getaway after having our kids
Had a fabulous vacation vibes
Whenever one books a vacation resort on the beach
You can do a day trip to Key West from Miami and see everything and you would b e glad you did not stay
When we booked a “ Waldorf resort ” for our Christmas vacation there was a certain expectation
We only stayed one night ended our trip early due to the horrible standards of this hotel
WA costs old Holiday Inn service and romsLocation was great but find another hotel B and B in the area
I think I should have been warned when I booked this trip 2 days prior and the beach was in these exact conditions and would be in for several more days
On to the check in we entered the lobby to find a woman so upset at the desk because housekeeping had left her room open twice and a family who was leaving because the hotel was so awful
The morning after we checked in we told the front desk of our disappointment to have planned the trip down and not be warned of the seaweed and we also were not very happy with the room
poor staff way too slow at cleaning rooms construction going on will never stay at any hilton group hotel again because of this experience
This hotel does not care about the people staying there worst experience of my life on a vacation
But the Reach is not cheap and for the price you will need to decide early on what is most important to you on your vacation before you commit to paying the price
Finally got the keys to our room at 530 yes the manager bought us a drink but this was very disappointing for the first day of our vacation
This trip on SUnday was most users we had ever seen maybe 50 people
